paste.description: Híbridos humanos e o homúnculo | Nerdologia
paste.body:
-Bedford, J. M. "Sperm/egg interaction: the specificity of human spermatozoa." The Anatomical Record 188, no. 4 (1977): 477-487.
-O'Bleness, Majesta, Veronica B. Searles, Ajit Varki, Pascal Gagneux, and James M. Sikela. "Evolution of genetic and genomic features unique to the human lineage." Nature Reviews Genetics 13, no. 12 (2012): 853-866.
-Rossiianov, Kirill. "Beyond species: Il’ya Ivanov and his experiments on cross-breeding humans with anthropoid apes." Science in Context 15, no. 02 (2002): 277-316.
-Sankararaman, Sriram, Swapan Mallick, Michael Dannemann, Kay Prüfer, Janet Kelso, Svante Pääbo, Nick Patterson, and David Reich. "The genomic landscape of Neanderthal ancestry in present-day humans." Nature 507, no. 7492 (2014): 354-357.
-Vernot, Benjamin, and Joshua M. Akey. "Resurrecting surviving Neandertal lineages from modern human genomes." Science 343, no. 6174 (2014): 1017-1021.
